de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper

Interface IDataStore


  • public interface IDataStore
    IDataStore contains information about the destination datastore and creates the handler objects

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String HANDLE_REFERENCED_RECURSIVE
      The name of the property, which defines the kind, how referenced objects in a mapper are read.

    • Field Detail

      • HANDLE_REFERENCED_RECURSIVE

        static final java.lang.String HANDLE_REFERENCED_RECURSIVE
        The name of the property, which defines the kind, how referenced objects in a mapper are read. In general this defines, wether an IObjectReference is used or not
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getKeyGenerator

        IKeyGenerator getKeyGenerator(java.lang.String generatorName)
        Request an IKeyGenerator with the given name. This method is called by IMapper, when the mapping is processed and an annotation KeyGenerator was found. The IDataStore will check for a supported IKeyGenerator and return it. If there is no IKeyGenerator supported by this IDataStore, an UnsupportedKeyGenerator is thrown
        Parameters:
        generatorName - the name of the requested generator
        Returns:
        an instance of IKeyGenerator
        Throws:
        UnsupportedKeyGenerator - when the requested generator is not supported by the current instance

      • getDefaultKeyGenerator

        IKeyGenerator getDefaultKeyGenerator()
        If for an IMapper the annotation KeyGenerator is undefined, then the default instance is requested here. If the implementation isn't using an IKeyGenerator, then null will be returned
        Returns:
        the default instance of IKeyGenerator or null, if the current instance does not need or support IKeyGenerator

      • shutdown

        void shutdown(io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Void>> resultHandler)
        Shutdown the current instance and their used resources
        Parameters:
        resultHandler -

      • setTriggerContextFactory

        void setTriggerContextFactory(ITriggerContextFactory factory)
        Possibility to set the factory to be used from outside, to enabe the usage of customized objects inside a trigger
        Parameters:
        factory - the factory to be set

      • getClient

        java.lang.Object getClient()
        Get the client, which is internally used to connect to the database
        Returns:
        the database specific client

      • getEncoder

        de.braintags.io.vertx.util.security.crypt.IEncoder getEncoder(java.lang.String name)
        Get an instance of IEncoder with the given name. Encoders to be used can be defined by the DataStoreSettings
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the encoder
        Returns:
        a valid instance of null
